name: Supply Run 925 [Jam Edition]
description:
This game will be update in the futur, we await your criticism & comment :) Croco'devs team

You are in charge of a gas station.
Only problem: you don't have enough stuff to supply your customers.
Don't worry, you'll be fine, go take what you need from your neighbours !!

Move: WASD
Interactions: E
Jump : Space

Game made during the 4th week of the ECDC's gamejam , with the theme "Do your best with what the heck you have!"
By Hugo Saal & Mève Audigier
With the help of Louis Dumur & Hanaë Bonnafaux
